short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: File Number: W8486-238912/A/SV Modification 002This amendment is raised to note there is no tech data or drawings for this contract. Please disregard Annex CAlso to give an extension by two weeks until December 19th, 2022Disregard Amendment 001 as the wrong file was posted by mistakeAmendment 001This amendment is raised to note there is no tech data or drawings for this contract. Please disregard Annex CNOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal by March 15th, 2022.Item 1, GSIN: N2530, NSN: 2530-21-921-7412, Wheel AssemblyPart No.: 98341-061, 60-108-20ASNSCM/CAGE: 076M6, 0XAP6Quantity: 80Unit of Issue: EachTo be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, QuebecBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NSCM/CAGE they are offering.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.Whether you are an Original Equipment Manufacturer, a Substitute, or an Equivalent Product contractor, consider presenting this request for an award as part of your bid package to the bidder.Client name location will help them to update your product or tasks properly. NOTE THEY DID NOT SEND THE DESIGN OR DRAWINGS FOR THIS PART NUMBER.
